name: Man Vs. Missiles: Combat
description:
Evade enemy Jets and fly your plane as long as you can before getting shot down!

- Use your finger to rotate and turn the plane to fly away from the incoming jets
- 4 different types of enemy jets will follow you and try to bring you down
- Collect in-game Power-ups like Shield, Boost, etc. to help you get away
- Collect coins to buy new planes and upgrade your power-ups from the Shop
- Use the on-board gun system to shoot and take down the enemy jets
- Complete a total of 50 levels, each with unique objectives in Career mode
- Compete for Global & Country Rankings in Online Tournaments
- Supporting Russian, Korean, Chinese and Japanese languages.
- 7 Days Free Trial for VIP Access

If you have played Man Vs. Missiles, you have to download this, and if you haven't you need to find out what the craze is about!

So what are you waiting for! Download the game if you choose to accept this challenge of Man Vs. Missiles: Combat - Chapter 2!

Please rate the game if you like it it, and feel free to send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com.

Official Promo:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ACGfDVQbrbk

--------
PLEASE NOTE: Man Vs. Missiles: Combat is free to download and play; however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Auto-renewable Subscription, called VIP Access is a service that unlocks all available Planes in the game, and also gives you access to VIP Planes with special abilities. It also removes all Ads and gives you 500 Daily Bonus coins.

You can subscribe to this using 3 Packs - Weekly with a 7-Days Free Trial, Monthly, and Yearly. All payments will be charged to your iTunes Account after purchase and when the subscription auto-renews.

Subscriptions will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.

Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited once you purchase a subscription.

PS. None of the In-App Purchases are mandatory to complete the game. You can finish the entire game including all levels, without the need of purchasing any Subscription or Coins Pack, but if you wish to enjoy all the Planes or finding it difficult, you can Subscribe which will unlock & buy all the planes in the game.
